name: Anti-Phishing
desc: Protects from phishing by scanning visited sites.

name: Ethereum L2 Transaction Tool
desc: CLI tool for transactions via Ethereum L2 (zkSync & StarkNet) using flashbots. Developed in Node.js using the ethers.js library.

name: Ethereum Reentrancy Attack Demo
desc: Contains KurbanContract managing user balances and Attack demonstrating a reentrancy vulnerability. A key resource for smart contract security education.

name: Zero-Knowledge Proofs Python Implementation
desc: A Python framework offering ZKP, allowing secure interactions without revealing the actual value, preserving privacy.

name: Ethereum Arbitrage Bot Contract
desc: Solidity contract for an arbitrage bot leveraging price disparities between Uniswap and Sushiswap DEXs. Uses UniswapV2 and SushiSwap Router interfaces.
